trans-unit.source: Windows: You should download binaries for LLVM and clang from here.
trans-unit.target: Windows：您应该从此处下载LLVM和clang的二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: block-buffering: the entire buffer is written out whenever it overflows, a hFlush is issued, or the handle is closed.
trans-unit.target: 块缓冲：每当缓冲区溢出，发出 hFlush 或关闭句柄时，整个缓冲区都会被写出。

trans-unit.source: block-buffering: when the buffer for the handle becomes empty, the next block of data is read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 块缓冲：当句柄的缓冲区变空时，下一个数据块被读入缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: default: 10. If a worker has that many arguments, none will be unpacked anymore.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：10。如果一个工人有那么多参数，则不再解压缩。

trans-unit.source: default: 100. Set the percentage factor for simplifier ticks.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：100。设置简化刻度的百分比系数。

trans-unit.source: default: 128. Set the maximum size of inline array allocations to ⟨n⟩ bytes (default: 128).
trans-unit.target: 默认值：128。将内联数组分配的最大大小设置为n个字节（默认值：128）。

trans-unit.source: default: 2. Set the number of phases for the simplifier. Ignored with -O0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：2.设置简化器的相数。用 -O0 忽略。

trans-unit.source: default: 2. Set the number of phases for the simplifier. Ignored with -O0.
default: 2000. Set the size threshold for the SpecConstr transformation to ⟨n⟩.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：2000。将SpecConstr转换的大小阈值设置为⟨n⟩。

trans-unit.source: default: 2000. Set the size threshold for the liberate-case transformation to ⟨n⟩
trans-unit.target: 默认值：2000。将自由案例转换的大小阈值设置为⟨n⟩

trans-unit.source: default: 32. Inline memcpy calls if they would generate no more than ⟨n⟩ pseudo instructions.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：32。内联 memcpy 调用，如果它们生成的伪指令不超过n个。

trans-unit.source: default: 32. Inline memset calls if they would generate no more than ⟨n⟩ pseudo instructions
trans-unit.target: 默认：32在线 memset 的电话，如果他们将产生不超过⟨n⟩伪指令

trans-unit.source: default: 4. Set the max iterations for the simplifier.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：4.设置简化器的最大迭代次数。

trans-unit.source: default: 4. Set the maximum number of patterns to display in warnings about non-exhaustive ones.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：4.设置要在有关非穷举模式的警告中显示的最大模式数。

trans-unit.source: default: 500K. Tweak assembly generator for binary blobs.
default: 6. Set the maximum number of bindings to display in type error messages.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：6.设置要在类型错误消息中显示的最大绑定数。

trans-unit.source: default: 6. Set the maximum number of refinement hole fits for typed holes to display in type error messages.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：6.设置要在类型错误消息中显示的类型孔的最大细化孔数量。

trans-unit.source: default: 6. Set the maximum number of valid hole fits for typed holes to display in type error messages.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：6.设置要在类型错误消息中显示的类型孔的有效孔配合的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: default: off. Sets the level of refinement of the refinement hole fits, where level n means that hole fits of up to n holes will be considered.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：关闭。设置细化孔配合的细化级别，其中级别 n 表示将考虑最多 n 个孔的配合。

trans-unit.source: default: off. Toggles whether refinements where one or more of the holes are abstract are reported.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：关闭。切换是否报告其中一个或多个孔是抽象的细化。

trans-unit.source: line-buffering: the entire output buffer is flushed whenever a newline is output, the buffer overflows, a hFlush is issued, or the handle is closed.
trans-unit.target: line-buffering：每当输出换行符，缓冲区溢出，发出 hFlush 或关闭句柄时，都会刷新整个输出缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: line-buffering: when the buffer for the handle is not empty, the next item is obtained from the buffer; otherwise, when the buffer is empty, characters up to and including the next newline character are read into the buffer. No characters are available until the newline character is available or the buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: 行缓冲：当句柄的缓冲区不为空时，从缓冲区获取下一项；否则，当缓冲区为空时，直到下一个换行符（包括下一个换行符）的字符都将被读入缓冲区。在没有换行符可用或缓冲区已满之前，没有字符可用。

trans-unit.source: no-buffering: output is written immediately, and never stored in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: no-buffering：输出立即写入，从不存储在缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: no-buffering: the next input item is read and returned. The hLookAhead operation implies that even a no-buffered handle may require a one-character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 无缓冲：读取并返回下一个输入项。该 hLookAhead 操作意味着，即使是没有缓冲的手柄可能需要一个字符缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Accessing the pointer to the array contents
Code that must be here for accessibility
trans-unit.target: 此处必须具有可访问性的代码
便利功能：将类型构造函数拆开

trans-unit.source: Generic operations defined in terms of gunfold
Integral types with lossless conversion to and from pointers
trans-unit.target: 整数类型与指针之间进行无损转换
懒惰的读者-作家状态的单子
模块数据。为方便起见，可重新输入

trans-unit.target: 标准输入和输出的特殊情况

trans-unit.source: The Data class for processing constructor applications
trans-unit.target: 用于处理构造函数应用程序的Data类
将文件描述符与句柄相互转换
不建议使用的一般合并功能

trans-unit.source: Filling up memory area with required values
From strings to constructors and vice versa: all data types
trans-unit.target: 从字符串到构造函数，反之亦然：所有数据类型

trans-unit.source: Guards for IO operations that may fail
Interpreting flags as transformations of an options record
trans-unit.target: 将标志解释为选项记录的转换
布尔值的编组（非零对应于 True ）

trans-unit.source: Operating on the raw buffer as a Ptr
Special cases for standard input and output
trans-unit.target: 标准输入和输出的特殊情况
其他通用表示类型构造函数

trans-unit.source: Representation of types with many constructors or many fields
trans-unit.target: 具有许多构造函数或许多字段的类型表示

trans-unit.source: Warning: this can fail with an unchecked exception.
trans-unit.target: 警告：这可能会因未检查的异常而失败。

trans-unit.source: Warning: this is only available on LLVM and can fail with an unchecked exception.
trans-unit.target: 警告：这仅在LLVM上可用，并且可能因未检查的异常而失败。

trans-unit.source: Warning: this is only available on LLVM.

Backtracking. Lastly, a simple form of backtracking could be introduced. We simply select the first matching axiom we encounter and when the entailment fails, we backtrack and look for other axioms that might match the wanted constraint.
trans-unit.target: 回溯。最后，可以介绍一种简单的回溯形式。我们只需选择遇到的第一个匹配公理，当合并失败时，我们回溯并寻找可能与所需约束匹配的其他公理。
的分配性 (*) 相对于 (+)
的分配性 (*) 相对于 (+)

trans-unit.source: Example. Suppose we have a C/C++ function to call that will return and then invoke a callback at some point in the future, passing us some data. We want to wait in Haskell for the callback to be called, and retrieve the data. We can do it like this:
trans-unit.target: 实例。假设我们有一个C / C ++函数要调用，该函数将返回，然后在将来的某个时刻调用回调，从而向我们传递一些数据。我们想在Haskell中等待调用回调，然后检索数据。我们可以这样做：

trans-unit.source: Invariant: NatJ# is used iff value doesn't fit in NatS# constructor. NB: Order of constructors *must* coincide with Ord relation
trans-unit.target: 不变量：使用 NatJ# 时，如果值不适用于 NatS# 构造函数。注意：构造函数的顺序*必须*与 Ord 关系一致
注： Semigroup 是一个超类 Monoid ，因为基础4.11.0.0。
注： Semigroup 是一个超类 Monoid ，因为基础4.11.0.0。
